titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Paola Zellner Bassett Architectural Collection, 1986-1991

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2017-011

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

p.emph: Please note: The current finding aid includes only minimal description of the collection. If you have questions, please contact Special Collections (specref@vt.edu) for more information.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Paola Zellner Basset joined the Architecture Faculty at Virginia Tech in 2008. She has served as a board member for the IAWA Center. In 1991, she obtained her B. Arch from the Universidad Nacional de Buenos Aires. In 1998, she completed her M. Arch at the Southern California Institute of Architecture.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains 48 rolled drawings (A1, ink on mylar; ink and pastel on vellum; and trace paper) from Paola Zellner Bassett’s undergraduate studies at Universidad Nacional de Buenos Aires in Argentina.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged chronologically (by year of study) and numerically (by sheet number).

controlaccess.subject: International Archive of Women in Architecture (IAWA)
